name: Travellin Cats Bundle
description:
For those who love Travellin Cats games - a thank you bonus discount! Pack includes: Cats Hidden in Paris
Cats Hidden in Paris - Extra Level
Cats Hidden in Italy
Cats Hidden in Bali
Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow

Each game, 100 cats are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.

Relax thanks to the chill soundtrack

Found a cat? Click on it! Features
  • 100 cats to find in each game
  • Easter Eggs
  • Hint System
  • Settings
